Class RechnungService

Namespace
IbeAppWeb.Services
Assembly
IbeAppWeb.dll

Provides functionality for retrieving invoice data related to projects.

public class RechnungService
Inheritance
object
RechnungService

object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Remarks

This service is designed to interact with an external API to fetch invoice information. It supports fetching invoices for different project types, such as "kanal" or "schacht".

Constructors

RechnungService(HttpClient, ILogger<ProjectService>) 

public RechnungService(HttpClient httpClient, ILogger<ProjectService> logger)

Parameters

httpClient HttpClient
logger ILogger<ProjectService>

Methods

GetAbschlagsRechnungenAsync(string, int)

Retrieves a list of AbschlagsRechnungDto objects from the specified project database.

public Task<List<AbschlagsRechnungDto>?> GetAbschlagsRechnungenAsync(string projectDb, int comboBoxValue)

Parameters

projectDb string

The name of the project database to query. This value is sent as a header in the request.

comboBoxValue int

Returns

Task<List<AbschlagsRechnungDto>>

A task representing the asynchronous operation. The result contains a list of AbschlagsRechnungDto objects if the request is successful, or an empty list if an error occurs.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP GET request to the appropriate API endpoint based on the value of isSchacht. The projectDb parameter is included as a custom header ("X-IbeProjectDB") in the request. If the request fails or an exception is thrown, the method logs the error and returns an empty list.

UpdateKanalAbschlagsrechnungByDateAsync(string, DateTime, DateTime, string, int)

Updates the Kanal Abschlagsrechnung or Schacht Abschlagsrechnung for a specified date range.

public Task<int> UpdateKanalAbschlagsrechnungByDateAsync(string projectDb, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate, string abschlagsrechnung, int comboBoxValue)

Parameters

projectDb string

The name of the project database to use for the operation. Cannot be null or empty.

startDate DateTime

The start date of the range for which the Abschlagsrechnung should be updated.

endDate DateTime

The end date of the range for which the Abschlagsrechnung should be updated.

abschlagsrechnung string

The identifier or type of the Abschlagsrechnung to update. Cannot be null or empty.

comboBoxValue int

Determines the type of Abschlagsrechnung to update. Use 1 for Kanal Abschlagsrechnung and any other value for Schacht Abschlagsrechnung.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of records updated as an integer. Returns -1 if an error occurs during the operation.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP POST request to update Abschlagsrechnung data based on the specified parameters. Ensure that the projectDb and abschlagsrechnung values are valid.

UpdateKanalAbschlagsrechnungByIdsAsync(string, int, int, string, int)

Updates the Kanal Abschlagsrechnung or Schacht Abschlagsrechnung for a specified date range.

public Task<int> UpdateKanalAbschlagsrechnungByIdsAsync(string projectDb, int idFrom, int idTo, string abschlagsrechnung, int comboBoxValue)

Parameters

projectDb string

The name of the project database to use for the operation. Cannot be null or empty.

idFrom int
idTo int
abschlagsrechnung string

The identifier or type of the Abschlagsrechnung to update. Cannot be null or empty.

comboBoxValue int

Determines the type of Abschlagsrechnung to update. Use 1 for Kanal Abschlagsrechnung and any other value for Schacht Abschlagsrechnung.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of records updated as an integer. Returns -1 if an error occurs during the operation.

Remarks

This method sends an HTTP POST request to update Abschlagsrechnung data based on the specified parameters. Ensure that the projectDb and abschlagsrechnung values are valid.
